path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Crosswise Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner can change router address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the router address.

findings.title: Owner can enable / disable presale
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable the presale feature.

findings.title: Owner can enable / disable swap and liquify
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable swap and liquify functionality.

findings.title: Owner can change transfer max amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transfer amount.

findings.title: Owner can mint tokens up to max supply amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint tokens up to the maximum supply amount without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can include in and exclude from anti whale
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to include or exclude certain addresses from the anti-whale mechanism.

findings.title: Owner can update soft cap, hard cap and second round amounts
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to update soft cap, hard cap, and second round amounts in the PreSale contract.

findings.title: Owner can update minimum purchase amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to update the minimum purchase amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can update maximum amount per wallet
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to update the maximum amount per wallet.

findings.title: Owner can include in and exclude from deposit whitelist
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to include or exclude addresses from the deposit whitelist without any restrictions.
